name: AID TO THE CHURCH IN NEED INTERNATIONAL
description: Supporting the persecuted Church with spiritual and material resources.
sampleDescriptions: Lobbying for passage of H.Res 82, non binding resolution and language for appropriations bill considering Nigeria's humanitarian aid crisis.
Lobbying for passage of the non-binding resolution, H.Res 82 on the persecution of Christians in Nigeria.
